signature.label: Our signature
signature.title:
FIVE MILLENNIAL
SYMBOLS
signature.description: Each frame carries within it a fragment of eternity. Five symbols spanning civilizations, five signatures of the House of Renaissance.

savoirFaire.label: Craftsmanship
savoirFaire.title:
ARTISANAL
EXCELLENCE
savoirFaire.description: Each frame is the result of more than 40 steps of artisanal craftsmanship. A meticulous process that guarantees exceptional quality.

engagement.label: Commitment
engagement.title:
SO THAT THIS
IS NEVER FORGOTTEN

manifeste.label: Manifesto
manifeste.title:
THE RENAISSANCE
MANIFESTO
manifeste.description: What we create is not just an accessory. It is an act of transmission.

histoire.seoDescription: Discover the story of RENAISSANCE Paris, a French luxury eyewear house. Our artisanal craftsmanship, values and commitment to excellence.

savoirFaire.seoDescription: Discover RENAISSANCE Paris artisanal craftsmanship. French manufacturing, noble materials and techniques of excellence for unique luxury eyewear.

manifeste.seoDescription: Discover the RENAISSANCE Paris manifesto. Our values of excellence, authenticity and French craftsmanship in service of luxury eyewear.

symboles.seoDescription: Discover the symbols that inspire RENAISSANCE Paris. Scarab, fleur-de-lis and Maltese cross: emblems steeped in history for unique eyewear.

blog.seoDescription: Discover the RENAISSANCE Paris universe. Articles on our symbols, artisanal craftsmanship and the history of French luxury eyewear.
blog.heroDescription: Discover the Renaissance universe beyond the object.
blog.emptyDescription: We are preparing exceptional content about our symbols, craftsmanship and the Renaissance universe.

article.notFoundDescription: This article does not exist or has been removed.
article.label: The Manifesto
article.authorBio: A member of the Renaissance team, passionate about the craftsmanship of excellence and the storytelling that gives meaning to every creation.

heroHistoire.label: Our Story
heroHistoire.title: A FORGOTTEN WORD.
heroHistoire.subtitle: Perfect for restoring.
heroHistoire.description: A word too grand for those with nothing to say. But perfect for those who have something to restore.
heroHistoire.mobileDescription: A word too grand for those with nothing to say. But perfect for those who have something to restore.

fondateursSection.label: The Origin
fondateursSection.title: BORN FROM A REFUSAL.
fondateursSection.subtitle: Three men of the craft.
fondateursSection.description: A refusal to accept sameness. A refusal to let fine work disappear. A refusal to look away. Not three heirs. Not three graduates. Three men of the craft.
fondateursSection.mobileDescription: A refusal to accept sameness. A refusal to let fine work disappear. Three men of the craft.

symbolesSection.label: Our Symbols
symbolesSection.title: FIVE SYMBOLS.
symbolesSection.subtitle: Engraved in metal.
symbolesSection.description: Each symbol carries meaning, history, a promise. Signs that have spoken for millennia. We didn't invent them. We wear them.
symbolesSection.symbol1Desc: Three points, three dimensions: strength, vision, precision. The symbol of mastered power.
symbolesSection.symbol2Desc: Inherited excellence. Purity of gesture and exacting attention to detail.
symbolesSection.symbol3Desc: The key to eternal life. What we build today must stand the test of time.
symbolesSection.symbol4Desc: Perpetual rebirth. Constant transformation and renewal.
symbolesSection.symbol5Desc: Vigilant protection. Elegant and powerful. Assertive presence, contained strength.

signatureSection.label: The Signature
signatureSection.title: ZERO LOGOS.
signatureSection.subtitle: Just you and what you know.
signatureSection.description: Left temple. A rhinestone. Smaller than a pinhead. Look closer. Symbols appear. Engraved in metal. Turn the piece over. A number. Engraved for you. It will only exist once. Like you.
signatureSection.mobileDescription: Left temple. A rhinestone. Smaller than a pinhead. Symbols engraved in metal. A unique number. Like you.

savoirFaireSection.label: Manufacturing
savoirFaireSection.title: MADE IN SOUTH KOREA.
savoirFaireSection.subtitle: 200 steps. Zero compromise.
savoirFaireSection.description: What makes a frame beautiful is what you can't see. The balance. The tension of the metal. The precise weight. Over 200 steps per pair. Zero showmanship. Just the result.

valeursSection.label: Our Values
valeursSection.title: FIVE PILLARS.
valeursSection.subtitle: Non-negotiable.
valeursSection.valeur1Desc: Every word true. Every gesture necessary. Every material right.
valeursSection.valeur2Desc: We treat no one as a number. Not a client, not a partner, not a craftsman.
valeursSection.valeur3Desc: True elegance doesn't demand attention. It's recognized by those who know.
valeursSection.valeur4Desc: We build so that in 20 years, someone inherits a pair and keeps it.
valeursSection.valeur5Desc: We don't rush. We do it right. Time is an ally, not an enemy.

collectionsSection.label: The Collections
collectionsSection.title: One house. Four collections. Zero chance.
collectionsSection.collection1Desc: Where it all begins. The striations. The signature.
collectionsSection.collection2Desc: The Trident. What is passed on.
collectionsSection.collection3Desc: The Fleur de Lys. What is built.
collectionsSection.collection4Desc: The Ankh, the Scarab, the Eye. What endures for 5,000 years.
collectionsSection.quote: We don't collect models. We collect symbols.

engagementSection.label: Our Commitment
engagementSection.title: ONCE, THINGS WERE REPAIRED.
engagementSection.subtitle: We still repair.
engagementSection.description: We build for ten years. We guarantee for two. We supply parts as long as the frame exists. We adjust for free. For life.
engagementSection.engagement1Desc: Our grandparents kept their belongings. Our parents started discarding. We choose differently.
engagementSection.engagement2Desc: Every piece has an origin. French design. Korean manufacturing. We tell you everything because we have nothing to hide.
engagementSection.engagement3Desc: 200 partners. Some since day one. We build relationships, not contracts.

ambassadeursSection.label: Ambassadors
ambassadeursSection.title: They wear Renaissance
ambassadeursSection.description: Famous faces. Different paths. One thing in common: they wear what lasts.
ambassadeursSection.quote: They don't wear Renaissance to be seen. They wear it because it reflects who they are. Because it says something about them.
